Body:
What We've Learned Updated: Customer have an issue with uninstalling and upgrading the EPP client . 

We have performed several troubleshooting steps to verify and understand how the issue is reproducing.

On the latest update from the client, they have found in their event viewer logs that the user do not have enough rights to run the installation package.
Next Steps Updated: We asked the customer to run the installation using an administrator user to verify is the situation persist.
